items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have to be at the meeting this afternoon.
Tom and his brother have very different personalities.
Tom arrived home from work later than usual yesterday.
There are some things that you should never try doing.
If I\'d known Tom\'s address, I could\'ve visited him.
Put on a sweater. If you don\'t, you\'ll catch a cold.
That\'s the same thing that I might\'ve chosen myself.
Why don\'t we go somewhere and get something to drink?
Tom was attacked by a rabid squirrel on Halloween day.
Tom was kind enough to show me the way to the station.
